[/quote]
Lmao, I don’t wear glasses, but I ain’t ashamed to be a nerd. Nerds mean you are smart and intelligent and you are above most people which you learn from in a group.
But you are some fucking dork. Dorks are ugly, smart at stupid things but probably eats their own boogers and looks like shit, which represents you. I don’t get banned from a hidden message saying this doesn’t belong here, neither do you. you shriveled up piece of slimy dorkshit. (sorry for my profanity @ mods and people that belong in this commute)[/quote]

LOL, I assure you I’m no Dork, to be honest I’m barely on a PC, I’m out most of the time believe me if people knew I done this shit my reputation would be lost aha.

item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“BadaBing, post:2, topic:436389”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=539100.msg3945081#msg3945081 date=1331776260]
why post here? we are a honest community.
To be honest, your banner sucks
your advertisement sucks
your using webs… LMAO
utterly disgusting, civil disobedience
[/quote]

An honest community, where’s the dishonesty…? & i didn’t create the banner, my Photoshop skills are guaranteed higher than yours… so don’t start with your criticism. Also funding’s are low, we will of course obtain a better host in near future but yet that has nothing to do with the development, all i see in your post is pure stubbornness & what i like to call people like you is POSH TW*TS.[/quote]
LOLOLOL, You couldn’t even create your own banner, I don’t see stubbornness because I was just being honest with you. I wouldn’t be talking about photoshop skills,
if you’d done photoshop, the brush tools would give up on you. If you tried to edit a photo of yourself, photoshop would freeze on you because you are so ugly.
Ignorant, stupid and unable to comprehend rules. I think this topic deserves a ban or anything higher than moderation…
